8005.quoteText: Note: the source of this document is the markdown file TERMS-OF-SERVICE-AND-PRIVACY.md available at the root of https://framagit.org/peppercarrot/website/
8005.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time

tosdr.case: This service provides archives of their Terms of Service so that changes can be viewed over time

8006.quoteText: The hosting company of the website OVH and domain-name registrar Gandi own respectively the machine where the website is hosted and its internet address. Therefore, these companies might log your access to the site.
8006.title: The service warns you of the potential consequences related to third-party access

tosdr.case: The service warns you of the potential consequences related to third-party access

8007.title: The service does not use third-party analytics or tracking platforms

tosdr.case: The service does not use third-party analytics or tracking platforms

8008.quoteText: I can't share the visitor statistics with anyone
8008.title: The service does not share user information with third parties

tosdr.case: The service does not share user information with third parties

8010.quoteText: We use only store cookies on your webbrowser to let your webbrowser remember your last selected language, and a session ID represented by a hash to allow continuity in the page you browse on the website.
8010.title: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website

tosdr.case: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website

8011.quoteText:
The session ID expires in less than 24 hours, after that a new one is generated.
The language cookie labeled with plxMyMultiLingue keeps around for a month.
8011.title: This service only uses temporary session cookies

tosdr.case: This service only uses temporary session cookies
